Big Town After Dark (1947, USA) Phillip Reed, Hillary Brooke - Film Noir Full Movie
sources.description: Big Town After Dark is a 1947 American film noir drama film directed by William C. Thomas and written by Whitman Chambers. The film stars Phillip Reed, Hillary Brooke, Richard Travis, Ann Gillis, Vince Barnett, Joe Sawyer and Robert Kent. Wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Big_Town_After_Dark Suggested Film Noirs: http://bit.ly/2tLevkl The Internet Archive is an excellent choice for entire full length Netflix & YouTube style uploads of drama, mystery, thriller & crime noir movies from the UK & USA for free. Download complete online British & American classic black & white films from the 1940s & 1950s.

metadata.Plot: When Lorelei Kilbourne leaves her job as the police reporter for the Illustrated Press, Managing Editor Steve Wilson employs the publisher's niece, Susan Peabody, to replace her. Susan becomes involved with gangsters in plotting a $50,000 swindle against her uncle, which Steve and the returned Lorelei uncover.
metadata.Writer: Whitman Chambers, Daniel Mainwaring, Maxwell Shane
metadata.Actors: Phillip Reed, Hillary Brooke, Richard Travis
